alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Saline (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 8:18PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Saline and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 818 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Galatia, or 10 miles south of Mcleansboro, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Galatia around 830 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Eldorado. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
